name: honeymoon
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 [ C or U ] a holiday taken by a couple immediately after their marriage: on your honeymoon Where are you going on your honeymoon?
[ C usually singular ] (also honeymoon period) a short period at the beginning of a new job, government, etc. when there is no criticism from anyone

Add to word list
Add to word list
a vacation or trip taken by two people who have just been married: We went to Hawaii on our honeymoon.
A honeymoon is also an early period in a relationship when criticism is not given: The first year of the presidency is regarded as a honeymoon. honeymoon verb [ I always + adv/prep ] us
